events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car with another vehicle on the highway during rush hour.
The claim was reviewed and categorised as an 'Auto Accident' due to the nature of the incident described.
An agent was assigned to assist the customer in processing their auto accident claim promptly and efficiently.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and confirmed the next steps to the claimant.
Requested police report, accident photos, and vehicle repair estimates from the claimant to support the investigation.
Received police report, multiple photos of the collision damage, and a repair quote from a certified garage.
Claims investigator began reviewing all submitted documents and contacted involved parties for additional information.
Investigation concluded with a full assessment of liability and damage valuation, confirming claimant's coverage eligibility.
A settlement offer was presented to the customer covering the full estimated repair costs less the deductible.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely processing and proposed settlement amount for their car damages.
Claim was formally approved by the insurance company, authorizing payment to cover the approved repair expenses.
Issued payment to the auto repair shop as per the approved settlement to expedite the vehicle restoration process.
Claim successfully closed after confirmation that repairs were completed and the customer was fully reimbursed.
All documents and case files related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference and compliance.
